description: Sunweld is a member of Arc Aile, Cisqua and Rowen`s senior officer, and Challo`s pleasure. He has brown hair and a lukewarm personality and look. In the manga, in a fight with Wolx Hound, he sustains a broken leg and a couple of cracked ribs. In the anime, he is beaten by three Sting Raids after he infiltrated Chaos Choir`s headquarters.
name: Sunweld
